wiki.content:
"Red Morning Light" is the first single taken from the Youth and Young Manhood album by the American rock band Kings of Leon. It follows the release of the EP, Holy Roller Novocaine, and was featured also as the first track on the upcoming album.
 
 The song was the leading track in sports video game FIFA Football 2004.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "Red Morning Light" is the first single taken from the Youth and Young Manhood album by the American rock band Kings of Leon. It follows the release of the EP, Holy Roller Novocaine, and was featured also as the first track on the upcoming album.  The song was the leading track in sports video game FIFA Football 2004.

track.name: Red Morning Light
comments: Used to play FIFA just for this song, was an awful game that one.
I remember hearing this on that one commercial ... whenever that was. Seems like forever ago.
loving me some KOL with cow bell.
I would like to say they were great live...but they cancelled the show.
Great first two albums but then went all commercial and shit, such a shame but still a great tune.
Band sounded like this before they decided to turn into Coldplay.  Good for their wallets, not for music listeners.
Back before they gave all their cinnamon away
esse baterista é o que há!
best KOL song [4]  One of the very best, yes.
